Value.label: PIR Trigger Off period
Value.Help: Period to send Trigger Off command after PIR is triggered. Before this period expires, the PIR will not be able to detect any subsequent motion. 8~720 seconds.

Value.label: Lux sensor threshold
Value.Help: Lux level to activate the PIR. When the lux level falls below this threshold and the PIR gets triggered. 30~200 seconds.

Value.label: Lux autoreport time
Value.Help: Lux level report interval. 0 = Off. 0~1440 Minutes.
